name: A shining silvery eyeball of the Lavaworm
data: It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users magical resistance a bit.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
It increases the users electric resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It can create magical fields which will disrupt all spellcasting in its vicinity.
